name: DIE! 3310
description:
Utilize your corpses and advance through the levels.

From the idea to the implementation, all done in the jam's duration.

Made For "NOKIA 3310 JAM 2"

==================================================

Number on the top left corner indicates, remaining bombs.

Controls:

  • Q: Left
  • E: Right
  • W: Place Bomb
  • 2: Jump
  • Z: Restart Level
  • C: Restart Game

Additional Info.:

  • Engine: From-Scratch Engine.
  • Lang: C++ with SDL2.
  • Levels:  5
  • Sound: No Sound.

Stay tuned as this game will get into more mature development phase.

2020 © Berhem Taher
